details:
One Tree Planted's projects in Latin America are rebuilding forests and restoring land so the benefits of healthy tropical forests can be felt worldwide. Our partners work with communities impacted by deforestation, so they benefit from improved forest management practices and agricultural techniques like agroforestry. This also ensures the trees and land are taken care of for generations to come, and the forests can continue to thrive.
        Select one of our tree-planting projects to learn more and help support reforestation in Latin America.
